module.name: kernel
module.summary: Policy for kernel threads, proc filesystem, and unlabeled processes and objects.

interface.name: kernel_domtrans_to
interface.summary: Allows to start userland processes by transitioning to the specified domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type entered by kernel.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The executable type for the entrypoint.

interface.name: kernel_ranged_domtrans_to
interface.summary: Allows to start userland processes by transitioning to the specified domain, with a range transition.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type entered by kernel.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The executable type for the entrypoint.

interface.name: kernel_rootfs_mountpoint
interface.summary: Allows the kernel to mount filesystems on the specified directory type.

param.name: directory_type
param.summary: The type of the directory to use as a mountpoint.

interface.name: kernel_setpgid
interface.summary: Set the process group of kernel threads.

interface.name: kernel_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to kernel threads.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process sending the signal.

interface.name: kernel_signal
interface.summary: Send a generic signal to kernel threads.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process sending the signal.

interface.name: kernel_share_state
interface.summary: Allows the kernel to share state information with the caller.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process with which to share state information.

interface.name: kernel_use_fds
interface.summary: Permits caller to use kernel file descriptors.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process using the descriptors.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to use kernel file descriptors.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of process not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_rw_pipes
interface.summary: Read and write kernel unnamed pipes.

interface.name: kernel_rw_unix_dgram_sockets
interface.summary: Read and write kernel unix datagram sockets.

interface.name: kernel_dgram_send
interface.summary: Send messages to kernel unix datagram sockets.

interface.name: kernel_tcp_recvfrom
interface.summary: Receive messages from kernel TCP sockets. (Deprecated)

interface.name: kernel_udp_send
interface.summary: Send UDP network traffic to the kernel. (Deprecated)

interface.name: kernel_udp_recvfrom
interface.summary: Receive messages from kernel UDP sockets. (Deprecated)

interface.name: kernel_load_module
interface.summary: Allows caller to load kernel modules

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type to allow to load kernel modules.

interface.name: kernel_search_key
interface.summary: Allow search the kernel key ring.

interface.name: kernel_link_key
interface.summary: Allow link to the kernel key ring.

interface.name: kernel_read_ring_buffer
interface.summary: Allows caller to read the ring buffer.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type allowed to read the ring buffer.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_read_ring_buffer
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read the ring buffer.

interface.name: kernel_change_ring_buffer_level
interface.summary: Change the level of kernel messages logged to the console.

interface.name: kernel_clear_ring_buffer
interface.summary: Allows the caller to clear the ring buffer.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type clearing the buffer.

interface.name: kernel_get_sysvipc_info
interface.summary: Get information on all System V IPC objects.

interface.name: kernel_getattr_debugfs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a kernel debugging filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_mount_debugfs
interface.summary: Mount a kernel debugging filesystem.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain mounting the filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_unmount_debugfs
interface.summary: Unmount a kernel debugging filesystem.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain unmounting the filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_remount_debugfs
interface.summary: Remount a kernel debugging filesystem.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain remounting the filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_search_debugfs
interface.summary: Search the contents of a kernel debugging filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_read_debugfs
interface.summary: Read information from the debugging filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_unmount_proc
interface.summary: Unmount the proc filesystem.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain unmounting the filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_getattr_proc
interface.summary: Get the attributes of the proc filesystem.

interface.name: kernel_search_proc
interface.summary: Search directories in /proc.

interface.name: kernel_list_proc
interface.summary: List the contents of directories in /proc.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_list_proc
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list the contents of directories in /proc.

interface.name: kernel_getattr_proc_files
interface.summary: Get the attributes of files in /proc.

interface.name: kernel_read_proc_symlinks
interface.summary: Read symbolic links in /proc.

interface.name: kernel_read_system_state
interface.summary: Allows caller to read system state information in proc.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the system state information.

interface.name: kernel_write_proc_files
interface.summary: Write to generic proc entries.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_read_system_state
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to read system state information in proc.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_read_proc_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to read system state information in proc.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_read_software_raid_state
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the state information for software raid.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading software raid state.

interface.name: kernel_rw_software_raid_state
interface.summary: Allow caller to read and set the state information for software raid.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading software raid state.

interface.name: kernel_getattr_core_if
interface.summary: Allows caller to get attribues of core kernel interface.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type getting the attibutes.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_core_if
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of core kernel interfaces.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type to not audit.

interface.name: kernel_read_messages
interface.summary: Allow caller to read kernel messages using the /proc/kmsg interface.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the messages.

interface.name: kernel_getattr_message_if
interface.summary: Allow caller to get the attributes of kernel message interface (/proc/kmsg).

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type getting the attributes.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_message_if
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get the attributes of kernel message interfaces.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_search_network_state
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the network state directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_search_network_state
interface.summary: Allow searching of network state directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_read_network_state
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the network state information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_read_network_state_symlinks
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the network state symbolic links.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_search_xen_state
interface.summary: Allow searching of xen state directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_search_xen_state
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the xen state directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_read_xen_state
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the xen state information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_read_xen_state_symlinks
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the xen state symbolic links.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type reading the state.

interface.name: kernel_write_xen_state
interface.summary: Allow caller to write xen state information.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type writing the state.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_list_all_proc
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list all proc directories.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_search_sysctl
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to search the base directory of sysctls.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_read_sysctl
interface.summary: Allow access to read sysctl directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type to allow to read sysctl directories.

interface.name: kernel_read_device_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to read the device sysctls.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type to allow to read the device sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_device_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write device sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_search_vm_sysctl
interface.summary: Allow caller to search virtual memory sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_vm_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to read virtual memory sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_vm_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write virtual memory sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_search_network_sysctl
interface.summary: Search network sysctl directories.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_search_network_sysctl
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to search network sysctl directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_read_net_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to read network sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_net_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to modiry contents of sysctl network files.

interface.name: kernel_read_unix_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to read unix domain socket sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_unix_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write unix domain socket sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_hotplug_sysctls
interface.summary: Read the hotplug sysctl.

interface.name: kernel_rw_hotplug_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write the hotplug sysctl.

interface.name: kernel_read_modprobe_sysctls
interface.summary: Read the modprobe sysctl.

interface.name: kernel_rw_modprobe_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write the modprobe sysctl.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_search_kernel_sysctl
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search generic kernel sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_kernel_sysctls
interface.summary: Read generic kernel sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_write_kernel_sysctl
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to write generic kernel sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_kernel_sysctl
interface.summary: Read and write generic kernel sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_fs_sysctls
interface.summary: Read filesystem sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_fs_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write fileystem sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_irq_sysctls
interface.summary: Read IRQ sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_irq_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write IRQ sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_read_rpc_sysctls
interface.summary: Read RPC sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_rpc_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write RPC sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_list_all_sysctls
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list all sysctl directories.

interface.name: kernel_read_all_sysctls
interface.summary: Allow caller to read all sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_rw_all_sysctls
interface.summary: Read and write all sysctls.

interface.name: kernel_kill_unlabeled
interface.summary: Send a kill signal to unlabeled processes.

interface.name: kernel_signal_unlabeled
interface.summary: Send general signals to unlabeled processes.

interface.name: kernel_signull_unlabeled
interface.summary: Send a null signal to unlabeled processes.

interface.name: kernel_sigstop_unlabeled
interface.summary: Send a stop signal to unlabeled processes.

interface.name: kernel_sigchld_unlabeled
interface.summary: Send a child terminated signal to unlabeled processes.

interface.name: kernel_list_unlabeled
interface.summary: List unlabeled directories.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_list_unlabeled
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list unlabeled directories.

interface.name: kernel_rw_unlabeled_dirs
interface.summary: Read and write unlabeled directories.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get the attributes of an unlabeled file.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_read_unlabeled_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to read an unlabeled file.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get the attributes of unlabeled symbolic links.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get the attributes of unlabeled named pipes.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get the attributes of unlabeled named sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_blk_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get attributes for unlabeled block devices.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_rw_unlabeled_blk_files
interface.summary: Read and write unlabeled block device nodes.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_getattr_unlabeled_chr_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts by caller to get attributes for unlabeled character devices.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The process type not to audit.

interface.name: kernel_relabelfrom_unlabeled_dirs
interface.summary: Allow caller to relabel unlabeled directories.

interface.name: kernel_relabelfrom_unlabeled_files
interface.summary: Allow caller to relabel unlabeled files.

interface.name: kernel_relabelfrom_unlabeled_symlinks
interface.summary: Allow caller to relabel unlabeled symbolic links.

interface.name: kernel_relabelfrom_unlabeled_pipes
interface.summary: Allow caller to relabel unlabeled named pipes.

interface.name: kernel_relabelfrom_unlabeled_sockets
interface.summary: Allow caller to relabel unlabeled named sockets.

interface.name: kernel_sendrecv_unlabeled_association
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from an unlabeled IPSEC association.

desc.p: Send and receive messages from an unlabeled IPSEC association. Network connections that are not protected by IPSEC have use an unlabeled assocation.
The corenetwork interface corenet_non_ipsec_sendrecv() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_sendrecv_unlabeled_association
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to send and receive messages from an unlabeled IPSEC association.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to send and receive messages from an unlabeled IPSEC association. Network connections that are not protected by IPSEC have use an unlabeled assocation.
The corenetwork interface corenet_dontaudit_non_ipsec_sendrecv() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_tcp_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Receive TCP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Receive TCP packets from a NetLabel connection, NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_tcp_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_tcp_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to receive TCP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to receive TCP packets from a NetLabel connection. NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_dontaudit_tcp_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_udp_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Receive UDP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Receive UDP packets from a NetLabel connection, NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_udp_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_udp_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to receive UDP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to receive UDP packets from a NetLabel connection. NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_dontaudit_udp_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_raw_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Receive Raw IP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Receive Raw IP packets from a NetLabel connection, NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_raw_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_dontaudit_raw_recvfrom_unlabeled
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to receive Raw IP packets from a NetLabel connection.

desc.p: Do not audit attempts to receive Raw IP packets from a NetLabel connection. NetLabel is an explicit packet labeling framework which implements CIPSO and similar protocols.
The corenetwork interface corenet_dontaudit_raw_recv_netlabel() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_sendrecv_unlabeled_packets
interface.summary: Send and receive unlabeled packets.

desc.p: Send and receive unlabeled packets. These packets do not match any netfilter SECMARK rules.
The corenetwork interface corenet_sendrecv_unlabeled_packets() should be used instead of this one.

interface.name: kernel_unconfined
interface.summary: Unconfined access to kernel module resources.
